ISSUE.TITLE: The selection of the installation region changes in some cases if the installation fails
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.40 develop Steps to reproduce the problem: Choose a country that is tied to some kind of common culture. After an unsuccessful installation, all countries associated with this culture will be marked in the drop-down list.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #5223 Fixed the selection of the installation region after the installation failed
